titleStmt.title: XXI divines (whose names are here-under affixed) cleared of the unjust criminations of Will. Penn in his pretended just rebuke for their epistle to a book, entitled, Quakerism no Christianity ..., / by John Faldo.
titleStmt.author: Faldo, John, 1633-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. for Dorman Newman, and Jonathan Robinson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
